tag_professor: Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
stu_tags: CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Professor Harmon-Pugh is a great teacher and you will definitely learn something from her. They only qualms I had was with how the test were structured, its all essay!! Which can be difficult at times but she gives you a review sheet to study from, so that helps. She is very helpful and gives great feedback. She really is a awesome person.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: I had Deborah Harmon-Pugh for Constitutonal Law and Public Policy and Professional Practices. She is the hardest professor I had in my School of Continuing Studies program. She is also the best. I learned more from her than I did most of the professors at CHC. Pay attention and do the work- and you are guaranteed to learn.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Excellent instructor. Passionate about the subject matter and it comes through in her presentations. You will not be bored with her.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: I had Deborah for Psychology of Leadership & Operations Mgmt. She is a very fair and clear. She can relate the topic to you in everyday realistic terms. She asks that you write a weekly paragraph about what is going on in the world around you. She gives a review sheet so you will know exactly what to study. I got A\'s in both of her classes.
